FulfillmentFalloutRule.name: FulfillmentFalloutRule
FulfillmentFalloutRule.description: Represents the fulfillment fallout handling rule.

ErrorCode.description: The failure error code of the fulfillment step that's associated with the rule.

FalloutQueueId.description: The fallout queue that's associated with the fallout task. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

FlowDefinitionName.description: The name of the flow definition that's associated with the AutoTask type of fulfillment step.

IntegrationDefinitionId.description: The integration definition that's associated with the Callout type of fulfillment step.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date when a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date when a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the flow definition that's associated with the AutoTask type of fulfillment step.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who created the fulfillment record.

RetriesAllowed.description: The maximum number of times a retry policy is run before the fulfillment step is considered failed.

RetryIntervals.description: The interval after which the selected retry policy is run when the fulfillment step fails. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

RetryPolicy.description: Specifies the retry policy used when the fulfillment step fails.

StepType.description: Specifies the type of fulfillment step associated with the fallout rule.
